tools.name: InspectB.in
tools.summary: InspectBin is based on the idea of RequestBin (requestb.in), set your http client or webhook to point to your InspectBin url. We will collect http requests and show it in a nice and friendly way, live!
tools.details: InspectBin is based on the idea of RequestBin (requestb.in), set your http client or webhook to point to your InspectBin url. We will collect http requests and show it in a nice and friendly way, live!

tools.name: RequestBin
tools.summary: RequestBin lets you create a URL that will collect requests made to it, then let you inspect them in a human-friendly way. Use RequestBin to see what your HTTP client is sending or to look at webhook requests.

tools.name: respondto.it
tools.summary: Debug web hooks like a pro. Create an endpoint to collect and respond to web hooks. View the last several requests, and configure canned responses in both JSON and XML.
